head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KELLY, MATTHEW J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KELLY, MATTHEW J.

block.p: KELLY--Matthew J. On February 22. Beloved husband of Patricia (nee McCrossan). Cherished brother of Hugh and Margaret Kelly Norman. Friends may call Sunday 2-4 and 7-9PM at Frank E. Campbell (The Funeral Chapel), 81st St. at Madison Ave. Mass of the Resurrection Monday, February 27 at 10:30AM, St. Jean Baptiste R.C. Church, 76th Street at Lexington Ave. Private burial.
